rules_text:
When Tentaclysm enters the battlefield, traverse Elmare. [i](Planeswalk to Elmare. If you're already there, cause {A}.)[/i]
Whenever a card is put into your graveyard, create a 1/1 blue Tentacle creature token. This ability triggers only once each turn.
Sacrifice eight Tentacles: Create an 8/8 blue Kraken creature token. Each opponent loses 8 life.
